title: Enhancing Hospitality Practical Competencies: MOOC-Based Self-Regulated Learning and Mathematical Learning Ownership Promotion

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of foundational mathematical knowledge and digital device usage experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify five self-regulated learning strategies and apply them in MOOC environments
Learners strengthen their ownership of learning by performing self-questioning (self-questioning) at least three times per week in relation to mathematics lesson design.
Learners complete the goal-setting-execution-evaluation cycle using self-regulated learning support tools within the LMS at least 80% of the time.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
